edu.cmu.cs.lti.discoursedb.io.prosolo.blog.converter

Class BlogConverterService

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.cs.lti.discoursedb.io.prosolo.blog.converter.BlogConverterService

  • @Transactional(propagation=REQUIRED,
               readOnly=false)
 @Service
public class BlogConverterService
extends Object
    This Service class maps blog entries to DiscourseDB
    Author:
    Oliver Ferschke

    • Method Detail

      • mapPost

        public void mapPost(ProsoloBlogPost p,
                    String discourseName,
                    String dataSetName,
                    Map<String,String> blogToEdxMap)
        Maps a prosolo blog post to DiscourseDB.
        Parameters:
        p - the blog post object to map to DiscourseDB
        discourseName - the name of the discourse the post was part of
        dataSetName - the name of the dataset the post was extracted from
        blogToEdxMap - a mapping from blog author names to edx username (possibly empty)

      • mapComment

        public void mapComment(ProsoloBlogComment c,
                       edu.cmu.cs.lti.discoursedb.core.model.macro.Contribution parent,
                       edu.cmu.cs.lti.discoursedb.core.model.macro.Discourse curDiscourse,
                       String dataSetName,
                       Map<String,String> blogToEdxMap)
        Parameters:
        c - a comment to a prosolo blog
        parent - the parent of the comment (either the article or another comment)
        curDiscourse - the discourse
        dataSetName - the dataset name
        blogToEdxMap - a mapping from blog author names to edx username (possibly empty)
